text: hi
Hi, would you donate to a children's charity?
you would like to donate to a children's charity?
Yes I would love to donate to a children's charity. Children do not have the same ability and responsibility as adults to help themselves.
it is a great one . you must appreciated
Thank you! will you donate in the future?
it is my responsibility . Not only me my family also donate to children's charity.
That is great! What reasons make you and your family enjoy donating to charity?
because i don't have father and mother . so i want to donate something for children . i thought that  no one child have hard times. my family is very good family ,. so they are also like to donate .
Amazing.. It must have been rough on you not having a father and mother. For me, I enjoy donating to good causes in general. Children with cancer charities are my favorite to donate to.
what a great soul . how many years you donating to the charity?
My first donation was in 2016 and since then I try to donate every couple of months. What about you? How long have you been donating?
what a same thinking i also donate every couple of years . my first donation was in 2012. you married or not ?
I am married, no children sadly. My wife has problems getting pregnant and we have been trying for a year now. I think it is amazing to know that other people donate. We do think alike!
so sorry about that . i pray to god soon you have a son or daughter and  they are also  donate something like you mark my words ..
Thank you for the kind words! A lot of people don't know that I want to become rich, but not for myself. I want to make a difference in the world.
what difference you want ?
I want to be able to start my own charity organizations to help children, animals, cancer patients, and a lot more. I will pray for your heart to not change because you seem to be very kind hearted!

i am very kind . because i know the feelings of cancer children , children without parents . this hit is the best hit i had ever seen . because it gives a good hearted person like you . thank you very much.
God bless you, it seems we can end the chat not, I am almost out of time as well. Thank you so much!
